summary.span: 提供有關目前環境和平台的資訊，以及操作的方法。

span.span: Provides information about, and means to manipulate, the current environment and platform.

summary.span: 這個類別無法被繼承。

span.span: This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用類別來擷取自上次系統開機，以及通用語言執行平台版本命令列引數、 結束代碼、 環境變數設定、 內容的呼叫堆疊、 時間等資訊。Use the class to retrieve information such as command-line arguments, the exit code, environment variable settings, contents of the call stack, time since last system boot, and the version of the common language runtime. ## Examples 下列範例示範會顯示一份目前環境的相關資訊。The following example demonstrates displays a list of information about the current environment. summary.span: 取得這個處理程序的命令列。

span.span: Gets the command line for this process.

value.span: 含有命令列引數的字串。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此屬性可存取的程式名稱和目前的處理序啟動時，在命令列上指定任何引數。This property provides access to the program name and any arguments specified on the command line when the current process was started. 程式名稱可以包含路徑資訊，但不需要執行這項操作。The program name can include path information, but is not required to do so. 使用剖析方法來擷取命令列的資訊，並儲存在陣列中的字串。Use the method to retrieve the command-line information parsed and stored in an array of strings. 指定的數字的字元; 未設定的命令列的緩衝區大小上限Windows 作業系統的電腦上執行而有所不同。The maximum size of the command-line buffer is not set to a specific number of characters; it varies depending on the Windows operating system that is running on the computer. ## Examples 下列範例會顯示它自己的命令列。The following example displays its own command line. [!code-cpp[environment.commandline#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/environment.CommandLine/CPP/commandline.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[environment.commandline#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/environment.CommandLine/CS/commandline.cs#1)] [!code-vb[environment.commandline#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/environment.CommandLine/VB/commandline.vb#1)]

summary.span: 取得或設定目前工作目錄的完整路徑。

span.span: Gets or sets the fully qualified path of the current working directory.

span.span: A string containing a directory path.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 根據定義，如果此程序啟動的本機目錄的根目錄或網路磁碟機，此屬性的值是後面接著斜線的磁碟機名稱 (例如，"c:\\")。By definition, if this process starts in the root directory of a local or network drive, the value of this property is the drive name followed by a trailing slash (for example, "C:\\"). 如果此程序啟動的子目錄中，這個屬性的值會是磁碟機和子目錄的路徑，不含尾端斜線 (比方說，「 C:\mySubDirectory")。If this process starts in a subdirectory, the value of this property is the drive and subdirectory path, without a trailing slash (for example, "C:\mySubDirectory"). ## Examples 下列範例示範如何設定屬性。The following example demonstrates setting the property. summary.span: 結束這個處理序，並傳回結束代碼給作業系統。

span.span: Terminates this process and returns an exit code to the operating system.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 針對`exitCode`參數，使用非零數值則表示錯誤。For the `exitCode` parameter, use a non-zero number to indicate an error. 在您的應用程式中，您可以列舉型別，定義您自己的錯誤碼，並傳回根據案例的適當的錯誤程式碼。In your application, you can define your own error codes in an enumeration, and return the appropriate error code based on the scenario. 例如，傳回值為 1，表示所需的檔案不存在，，值為 2，表示檔案是格式錯誤。For example, return a value of 1 to indicate that the required file is not present, and a value of 2 to indicate that the file is in the wrong format. 如需 Windows 作業系統所使用的結束代碼，請參閱[System Error Codes](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ms681381.aspx) Windows 文件中。For a list of exit codes used by the Windows operating system, see [System Error Codes](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ms681381.aspx) in the Windows documentation. 呼叫方法不同於使用您的程式語言`return`如下的陳述式：Calling the method differs from using your programming language's `return` statement in the following ways: - 一律會終止應用程式。 always terminates an application. 使用`return`陳述式可能會結束的應用程式，只有當它用於在應用程式的進入點，例如`Main`方法。Using the `return` statement may terminate an application only if it is used in the application entry point, such as in the `Main` method. - 應用程式會立即終止，即使其他執行緒正在執行。 terminates an application immediately, even if other threads are running. 如果`return`陳述式會呼叫應用程式進入點中，卻會導致應用程式只在所有前景執行緒都已都結束之後終止。If the `return` statement is called in the application entry point, it causes an application to terminate only after all foreground threads have terminated. - 呼叫者必須具備權限呼叫 unmanaged 程式碼。 requires the caller to have permission to call unmanaged code. `return`陳述式並不會。The `return` statement does not. - 如果會從呼叫`try`或是`catch`封鎖，請在任何程式碼`finally`區塊不會執行。If is called from a `try` or `catch` block, the code in any `finally` block does not execute. 如果`return`陳述式使用時中的程式碼`finally`區塊未執行。If the `return` statement is used, the code in the `finally` block does execute. - 如果時，會呼叫中的程式碼[限制的執行區域](~/docs/framework/performance/constrained-execution-regions.md)(CER) 正在執行時，CER 無法完成執行。If is called when code in a [constrained execution region](~/docs/framework/performance/constrained-execution-regions.md) (CER) is running, the CER will not complete execution. 如果`return`陳述式時，CER 完成執行。If the `return` statement is used, the CER completes execution.

summary.span: 取得或設定處理序的結束代碼。

span.span: Gets or sets the exit code of the process.

value.span: 含有結束代碼的 32 位元帶正負號的整數 (Signed Integer)。

span.span: A 32-bit signed integer containing the exit code.

value.span: 預設值為 0 (零)，表示處理序順利完成。

span.span: The default value is 0 (zero), which indicates that the process completed successfully.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果`Main`方法會傳回`void`，您可以使用這個屬性，若要設定將會傳回給呼叫環境的結束代碼。If the `Main` method returns `void`, you can use this property to set the exit code that will be returned to the calling environment. 如果`Main`不會傳回`void`，會忽略這個屬性。If `Main` does not return `void`, this property is ignored. 這個屬性的初始值為零。The initial value of this property is zero. > [!WARNING] > 屬性是帶正負號的 32 位元整數。The property is a signed 32-bit integer. 若要避免屬性傳回非負數的結束代碼，您不應該使用值大於或等於為 0x80000000。To prevent the property from returning a negative exit code, you should not use values greater than or equal to 0x80000000. 使用非零值表示錯誤。Use a non-zero number to indicate an error. 在您的應用程式中，您可以列舉型別，定義您自己的錯誤碼，並傳回根據案例的適當的錯誤程式碼。In your application, you can define your own error codes in an enumeration, and return the appropriate error code based on the scenario. 例如，傳回值為 1，表示所需的檔案不存在，值為 2，表示檔案是格式錯誤。For example, return a value of 1 to indicate that the required file is not present and a value of 2 to indicate that the file is in the wrong format. 如需 Windows 作業系統所使用的結束代碼，請參閱[System Error Codes](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ms681381\(v=vs.85\)) Windows 文件中。For a list of exit codes used by the Windows operating system, see [System Error Codes](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ms681381\(v=vs.85\)) in the Windows documentation. ## Examples 以下是簡單的應用程式，名為 Double.exe，做為命令列引數傳遞給它的整數值加倍。The following is a simple app named Double.exe that doubles an integer value passed to it as a command-line argument. 值會指派到的錯誤代碼屬性來指出錯誤情況。The value assigns error codes to the property to indicate error conditions. 請注意，您必須新增 System.Numerics.dll 組件，若要成功編譯範例的參考。Note that you must add a reference to the System.Numerics.dll assembly to successfully compile the example. [!code-csharp[System.Environment.ExitCode#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.environment.exitcode/cs/double.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Environment.ExitCode#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.environment.exitcode/vb/double.vb#1)] 此範例可以接著叫用批次檔，如下所示，使用，讓其錯誤碼可存取`ERRORLEVEL`命令。The example can then be invoked from a batch file such as the following, which makes its error codes accessible by using the `ERRORLEVEL` command. ``` echo off Double.exe %1 If errorlevel 1639 goto NoArg if errorlevel 534 goto Overflow if errorlevel 160 goto BadArg if errorlevel 0 echo Completed Successfully goto :EOF :NoArg echo Missing argument goto :EOF : Overflow echo Arithmetic overflow goto :EOF :BadArg echo Invalid argument goto :EOF ``` 以下顯示某些產生叫用批次檔的範例輸出。The following shows some sample output produced by invoking the batch file. ```Output >getdouble 123>echo offResult: 246Completed Successfully>getdouble 5912323109093>echo offArithmetic overflow>getdouble>echo offMissing argument>getdouble "a string">echo offInvalid argument ``` Double.exe 為與下列範例中，函式相同，不同之處在於前者會定義名為進入點，請注意該程式碼`Main`，沒有任何傳回值，而這個範例會定義名為進入點`Main`，傳回一個整數。Note that code for Double.exe is identical in function to the following example, except that the former defines an entry point named `Main` that has no return value, whereas this example defines an entry point named `Main` that returns an integer. [!code-csharp[System.Environment.ExitCode#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.environment.exitcode/cs/double1.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Environment.ExitCode#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.environment.exitcode/vb/double1.vb#2)]

summary.span: 用變數值的等值字串來取代內嵌於指定字串內的每個環境變數名稱，然後傳回結果字串。

span.span: Replaces the name of each environment variable embedded in the specified string with the string equivalent of the value of the variable, then returns the resulting string.

returns.span: 由字串值取代每個環境變數的字串。

span.span: A string with each environment variable replaced by its value.

remarks.format: ## Remarks COM interop 來從作業系統擷取環境變數。COM interop is used to retrieve the environment variables from the operating system. 如果無法擷取環境變數，因為 COM 錯誤，說明失敗的原因的 HRESULT 用來產生其中幾個可能的例外狀況;也就是例外狀況的 HRESULT 而定。If the environment variables cannot be retrieved due to a COM error, the HRESULT that explains the cause of the failure is used to generate one of several possible exceptions; that is, the exception depends on the HRESULT. 如需有關 HRESULT 的處理方式的詳細資訊，請參閱的 < 備註 > 一節方法。For more information about how the HRESULT is processed, see the Remarks section of the method. 取代作業只會設定環境變數。Replacement only occurs for environment variables that are set. 例如，假設`name`是 「 MyENV = %myenv%"。For example, suppose `name` is "MyENV = %MyENV%". 如果設定環境變數，MyENV，是為 42，則這個方法會傳回"MyENV = 42"。If the environment variable, MyENV, is set to 42, this method returns "MyENV = 42". 如果未設定 MyENV，便會不發生任何變更;這個方法會傳回"MyENV = %myenv%"。If MyENV is not set, no change occurs; this method returns "MyENV = %MyENV%". 傳回值的大小會限制為 32 K。The size of the return value is limited to 32K. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何取得系統磁碟機和系統根變數。The following example shows how to obtain the system drive and system root variables. [!code-cpp[Environment.ExpandEnvironmentVariables#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/environment.ExpandEnvironmentVariables/CPP/expandenvironmentvariables.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Environment.ExpandEnvironmentVariables#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/environment.ExpandEnvironmentVariables/CS/expandenvironmentvariables.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Environment.ExpandEnvironmentVariables#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/environment.ExpandEnvironmentVariables/VB/expandenvironmentvariables.vb#1)]

span.span: Immediately terminates a process after writing a message to the Windows Application event log, and then includes the message in error reporting to Microsoft.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會結束處理程序，而不執行任何使用中`try` / `finally`區塊或完成項。This method terminates a process without running any active `try`/`finally` blocks or finalizers. 方法寫入`message`Windows 應用程式事件記錄檔中，字串會建立您的應用程式的傾印，並終止目前的處理序。The method writes the `message` string to the Windows Application event log, creates a dump of your application, and then terminates the current process. `message`字串也會包含在向 Microsoft 回報錯誤。The `message` string is also included in error reporting to Microsoft. 使用方法，而非方法來終止您的應用程式，如果您的應用程式的狀態已損毀修復，並執行您的應用程式`try` / `finally`區塊和完成項會損毀程式資源。Use the method instead of the method to terminate your application if the state of your application is damaged beyond repair, and executing your application's `try`/`finally` blocks and finalizers will corrupt program resources. 使用 Windows 錯誤報告資訊回報給 Microsoft。Information is reported to Microsoft by using Windows Error Reporting. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[Windows 錯誤報告：開始使用](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/hardware/dn641144.aspx)。For more information, see [Windows Error Reporting: Getting Started](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/hardware/dn641144.aspx). ## Examples 下列範例會寫入 Windows 應用程式事件記錄檔中的記錄項目，並終止目前的處理序。The following example writes a log entry to the Windows Application event log and terminates the current process. summary.span: 將訊息寫入 Windows 應用程式事件記錄檔後立即終止處理程序，然後在向 Microsoft 回報錯誤時，包含該訊息和例外狀況資訊。

span.span: Immediately terminates a process after writing a message to the Windows Application event log, and then includes the message and exception information in error reporting to Microsoft.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會結束而不需要執行任何使用中的程序`try` / `finally`區塊或完成項。This method terminates the process without running any active `try`/`finally` blocks or finalizers. 方法寫入`message`Windows 應用程式事件記錄檔中，字串會建立您的應用程式的傾印，並終止目前的處理序。The method writes the `message` string to the Windows Application event log, creates a dump of your application, and then terminates the current process. 使用 Windows 錯誤報告資訊回報給 Microsoft。Information is reported to Microsoft by using Windows Error Reporting. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[Windows 錯誤報告：開始使用](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/hardware/dn641144.aspx)。For more information, see [Windows Error Reporting: Getting Started](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/hardware/dn641144.aspx). 向 Microsoft 回報錯誤包括`message`和`exception`提供用來分類錯誤詳細資料的資訊。Error reporting to Microsoft includes `message` and `exception` information, which provides details used to classify the error. 雖然`exception`是未處理因為處理序終止，引發例外狀況的內容資訊仍然取得。Although `exception` is not handled because the process is terminated, the contextual information that raised the exception is still obtained. 如果`exception`已`null`，或如果`exception`是此方法不會擲回，操作相同方法多載。If `exception` is `null`, or if `exception` is not thrown, this method operates the same as the method overload. 使用方法，而非方法來終止您的應用程式，如果您的應用程式的狀態已損毀修復，並執行您的應用程式`try` / `finally`區塊和完成項會損毀程式資源。Use the method instead of the method to terminate your application if the state of your application is damaged beyond repair, and executing your application's `try`/`finally` blocks and finalizers will corrupt program resources.

summary.span: 傳回字串陣列，包含目前處理序的命令列引數。

span.span: Returns a string array containing the command-line arguments for the current process.

returns.span: 字串的陣列，其中的每個元素都包含命令列引數。

span.span: An array of string where each element contains a command-line argument.

returns.span: 第一個元素是可執行檔名稱，後面的零或多個元素包含其餘的命令列引數。

span.span: The first element is the executable file name, and the following zero or more elements contain the remaining command-line arguments.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 陣列中的第一個項目包含的檔案名稱的執行中的程式。The first element in the array contains the file name of the executing program. 如果無法使用的檔案名稱，第一個項目是否等於。If the file name is not available, the first element is equal to . 其餘的項目包含在命令列上輸入的任何其他權杖。The remaining elements contain any additional tokens entered on the command line. 程式檔案名稱，但不是需要，包含路徑資訊。The program file name can, but is not required to, include path information. 命令列引數是以空格分隔。Command line arguments are delimited by spaces. 您可以使用雙引號 （"），以引數中加入空格。You can use double quotation marks (") to include spaces within an argument. 不過，單引號 （'），不提供這項功能。The single quotation mark ('), however, does not provide this functionality. 如果雙引號後面兩個或偶數數目的反斜線，每個繼續反斜線配對會取代一個反斜線，並移除雙引號。If a double quotation mark follows two or an even number of backslashes, each proceeding backslash pair is replaced with one backslash and the double quotation mark is removed. 如果雙引號後面奇數數目的反斜線，包括只執行一個一個反斜線取代每個先前的配對，並移除其餘的反斜線;不過，在此情況下將雙引號不會移除。If a double quotation mark follows an odd number of backslashes, including just one, each preceding pair is replaced with one backslash and the remaining backslash is removed; however, in this case the double quotation mark is not removed. 下表顯示如何命令列引數可以是分隔，並假設`MyApp`為目前正在執行的應用程式。The following table shows how command line arguments can be delimited, and assumes `MyApp` as the current executing application. |在命令列輸入Input at the command line|產生的命令列引數Resulting command line arguments| |-------------------------------|--------------------------------------| |`MyApp alpha beta`|`MyApp, alpha, beta`| |`MyApp "alpha with spaces" "beta with spaces"`|`MyApp, alpha with spaces, beta with spaces`| |`MyApp 'alpha with spaces' beta`|`MyApp, 'alpha, with, spaces', beta`| |`MyApp \\\alpha \\\\"beta`|`MyApp, \\\alpha, \\beta`| |`MyApp \\\\\"alpha \"beta`|`MyApp, \\"alpha, "beta`| 若要取得命令列以單一字串，請使用屬性。To obtain the command line as a single string, use the property. ## Examples 下列範例會顯示應用程式的命令列引數。The following example displays the application's command line arguments. [!code-cpp[Environment.GetCommandLineArgs#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Environment.GetCommandLineArgs/CPP/getcommandlineargs.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Environment.GetCommandLineArgs#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Environment.GetCommandLineArgs/CS/getcommandlineargs.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Environment.GetCommandLineArgs#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/Environment.GetCommandLineArgs/VB/getcommandlineargs.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會從目前的處理序的環境區塊來擷取環境變數。The method retrieves an environment variable from the environment block of the current process only. 它相當於呼叫方法`target`的值。It is equivalent to calling the method with a `target` value of . 若要擷取所有環境變數，以及它們的值，請呼叫方法。To retrieve all environment variables along with their values, call the method. 環境變數名稱會區分大小寫，在 Linux 和 macOS 上，但在 Windows 上不區分大小寫。Environment variable names are case-sensitive on Linux and macOS but are not case-sensitive on Windows. ### 在 Windows 系統上On Windows systems 在 Windows 系統上目前的處理序的環境區塊包含：On Windows systems, the environment block of the current process includes: - 所有環境變數提供給它的父處理序中建立它。All environment variables that are provided to it by the parent process that created it. 例如，從主控台視窗中啟動.NET 應用程式會繼承所有的主控台視窗的環境變數。For example, a .NET application launched from a console window inherits all of the console window's environment variables. 如果沒有父處理序，會改用每台電腦和每個使用者環境變數。If there is no parent process, per-machine and per-user environment variables are used instead. 比方說，新的主控台視窗會有在其啟動階段定義之所有每台電腦和每個使用者的環境變數。For example, a new console window has all per-machine and per-user environment variables defined at the time it was launched. - 新增至 process 區塊，藉由呼叫執行此程序時所有變數方法或方法`target`的值。Any variables added to the process block while the process is running by calling either the method or the method with a `target` value of . 這些環境變數會保存到.NET 應用程式終止為止。These environment variables persist until the .NET application terminates. 如果啟動處理程序之後，會建立環境變數，您可以使用這個方法來擷取只藉由呼叫所建立的變數方法或方法`target`的值.。If environment variables are created after the process has started, you can use this method to retrieve only those variables that were created by calling the method or the method with a `target` value of .. ### 在 macOS 和 Linux 系統上On macOS and Linux systems 在 macOS 和 Linux 上，目前的處理序的環境區塊會包含下列環境變數：On macOS and Linux, the environment block of the current proccess includes the following environment variables: - 所有環境變數提供給它的父處理序中建立它。All environment variables that are provided to it by the parent process that created it. 從殼層啟動.NET 應用程式，這包括在介面中定義的所有環境變數。For .NET applications launched from a shell, this includes all environment variables defined in the shell. - 新增至 process 區塊，藉由呼叫執行此程序時所有變數方法或方法`target`的值。Any variables added to the process block while the process is running by calling either the method or the method with a `target` value of . 這些環境變數會保存到.NET 應用程式終止為止。These environment variables persist until the .NET application terminates. 在 macOS 上.NET core 和 Linux 不支援每台電腦或每位使用者的環境變數。.NET Core on macOS and Linux does not support per-machine or per-user environment variables. ## Examples 下列範例會使用方法來擷取`windir`環境變數，其中包含 Windows 目錄的路徑。The following example uses the method to retrieve the `windir` environment variable, which contains the path of the Windows directory. [!code-cpp[System.Environment#4](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Environment/CPP/Vars1.cpp#4)] [!code-csharp[System.Environment#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Environment/CS/Vars1.cs#4)] [!code-vb[System.Environment#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Environment/VB/Vars1.vb#4)] 下列範例會嘗試擷取名為環境變數的值`Test1`程序的環境區塊中。The following example attempts to retrieve the value of an environment variable named `Test1` from the process environment block. 如果變數不存在，此範例會建立它，並擷取其值。If the variable doesn't exist, the example creates its and retrieves its value. 此範例會顯示變數的值。The example displays the value of the variable. 如果此範例會建立變數，它也會呼叫方法的每個成員列舉型別，以建立可以擷取只會從目前的處理程序的環境區塊的變數。If the example created the variable, it also calls the method with each member of the enumeration to establish that the variable can be retrieved only from the current process environment block. 最後，如果此範例會建立變數，它會刪除它。Finally, if the example created the variable, it deletes it. [!code-csharp[System.Environment.GetEnvironmentVariable#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.environment.getenvironmentvariable/cs/getenvironmentvariableex1.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Environment.GetEnvironmentVariable#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.environment.getenvironmentvariable/vb/getenvironmentvariableex1.vb#2)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要擷取所有環境變數，以及它們的值，請呼叫方法。To retrieve all environment variables along with their values, call the method. 環境變數名稱會區分大小寫，在 Linux 和 macOS 上，但在 Windows 上不區分大小寫。Environment variable names are case-sensitive on Linux and macOS but are not case-sensitive on Windows. ### 在 Windows 系統上On Windows systems 在 Windows，`target`參數會指定是否要在從目前的處理序或目前的使用者或本機電腦的 Windows 作業系統登錄機碼，擷取環境變數。On Windows, the `target` parameter specifies whether the environment variable is retrieved from the current process or from the Windows operating system registry key for the current user or local machine. 正如其他任何環境變數可用來建立.NET 處理序父處理序，所有的每位使用者及每台電腦的環境變數會自動複製到目前的處理序的環境區塊。All per-user and per-machine environment variables are automatically copied into the environment block of the current process, as are any other environment variables that are available to the parent process that created the .NET process. 不過，環境變數只能加入目前的處理序的環境區塊藉由呼叫方法或方法`target`的值程序期間只會保存。However, environment variables added only to the environment block of the current process by calling either the method or the method with a `target` value of persist only for the duration of the process. ### 在 macOS 和 Linux 系統上On macOS and Linux systems 在 macOS 和 Linux 上`GetEnvironmentVariable(String, EnvironmentVariableTarget)`方法可支援`target`的值只。On macOS and Linux, the `GetEnvironmentVariable(String, EnvironmentVariableTarget)` method supports a `target` value of only. 呼叫具有`target`的值或是不支援，並傳回`null`。Calls with a `target` value of or are not supported and return `null`. 每個處理序環境變數為：Per-process environment variables are: - 這些繼承自父處理序，通常用來叫用 shell`dotnet.exe`或啟動.NET 應用程式。Those inherited from the parent process, typically the shell used to invoke `dotnet.exe` or to launch the .NET application. - 藉由呼叫定義方法或方法`target`的值。Those defined by calling either the method or the method with a `target` value of . 這些環境變數只會保存到`dotnet`程序或.NET 應用程式會終止。These environment variables persist only until the `dotnet` process or the .NET application terminates. ## Examples 下列範例會建立處理程序、 使用者和電腦目標的環境變數，然後檢查作業系統登錄是否包含使用者和電腦的環境變數，然後刪除環境變數。The following example creates environment variables for the Process, User, and Machine targets, checks whether the operating system registry contains the User and Machine environment variables, then deletes the environment variables. [!code-cpp[environment.getsetenvar#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/environment.getsetenvar/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[environment.getsetenvar#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/environment.getsetenvar/CS/gsev.cs#1)] [!code-vb[environment.getsetenvar#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/environment.getsetenvar/VB/gsev.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 名稱和環境變數的值會儲存在傳回的索引鍵 / 值組為。The names and values for the environment variables are stored as key-value pairs in the returned . ### 在 Windows 系統上On Windows systems 在 Windows 系統上`GetEnvironmentVariables`方法會傳回下列環境變數：On Windows systems, the `GetEnvironmentVariables` method returns the following environment variabless: - 所有每台電腦在建立程序，以及它們的值所定義的環境變數。All per-machine environment variables that are defined at the time the process is created, along with their values. - 所有的每個使用者環境變數時所定義的程序隨即建立，以及它們的值。All per-user environment variables that are defined at the time the process is created, along with their values. - 繼承自父處理序的.NET 應用程式已啟動，或加入 process 區塊，執行此程序時所有變數。Any variables inherited from the parent process from which the .NET application was launched or added to the process block while the process is running. 環境變數會加入程序執行時呼叫方法或方法`target`的值。Environment variables are added while the process is running by calling either the method or the method with a `target` value of . ### 在 macOS 和 Linux 系統上On macOS and Linux systems 在 MacOS 和 Linux 上`GetEnvironmentVariables`方法會擷取名稱和值繼承自父處理序啟動的所有環境變數`dotnet`處理程序或所定義的範圍內`dotnet`程序本身。On MacOS and Linux, the `GetEnvironmentVariables` method retrieves the name and value of all environment variables that are inherited from the parent process that launched the `dotnet` process or that are defined within the scope of the `dotnet` process itself. 一次`dotnet`不再存在於處理序結束，這些第二個環境變數。Once the `dotnet` process ends, these latter environment variables cease to exist. .NET core 不支援每台電腦或每位使用者的環境變數。.NET Core does not support per-machine or per-user environment variables. ## Examples 下列範例示範方法。The following example demonstrates the method. [!code-cpp[Environment.GetEnvironmentVariables#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Environment.GetEnvironmentVariables/CPP/getenvironmentvariables.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Environment.GetEnvironmentVariables#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Environment.GetEnvironmentVariables/CS/getenvironmentvariables.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Environment.GetEnvironmentVariables#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/Environment.GetEnvironmentVariables/VB/getenvironmentvariables.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 名稱和環境變數的值會儲存在傳回的索引鍵/值組為物件。The names and values of the environment variables are stored as key/value pairs in the returned object. ### 在 Windows 系統上On Windows systems 在 Windows 系統上`target`參數會指定來源是目前的處理序、 登錄機碼，針對目前的使用者或在本機電腦的登錄機碼。On Windows systems, the `target` parameter specifies whether the source is the current process, the registry key for the current user, or the registry key for the local machine. ### 在 macOS 和 Linux 系統上On macOS and Linux systems 在 macOS 和 Linux，只有`target`的值支援。On macOS and Linux, only a `target` value of is supported. 每個處理序環境變數繼承自父處理序 （通常是殼層） 用來啟動`dotnet`處理，或所定義的範圍內`dotnet`程序本身。Per-process environment variables are inherited from the parent process (typically the shell) used to launch the `dotnet` process or are defined within the scope of the `dotnet` process itself. 一次 dotnet 處理序結束，這些第二個環境變數就會消失。Once the dotnet process ends, these latter environment variables cease to exist. 不支援每台電腦和每個使用者環境變數。Per-machine and per-user environment variables are not supported. A`target`的值或傳回空陣列。A `target` value of or returns an empty array. ## Examples 下列範例會建立處理程序、 使用者和電腦目標的環境變數，然後檢查作業系統登錄是否包含使用者和電腦的環境變數，然後刪除環境變數。The following example creates environment variables for the Process, User, and Machine targets, checks whether the operating system registry contains the User and Machine environment variables, then deletes the environment variables. remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會擷取系統特殊資料夾，例如 Program Files、 程式、 系統或啟動時，可用來存取通用資訊的路徑。This method retrieves the path to a system special folder, such as Program Files, Programs, System, or Startup, which can be used to access common information. 特殊資料夾會設定依預設，系統，或由使用者明確安裝的 Windows 版本時。Special folders are set by default by the system, or explicitly by the user, when installing a version of Windows. `folder`參數指定要擷取的特殊資料夾，且必須在值的其中一個列舉; 任何其他值則會擲回例外狀況。The `folder` parameter designates the special folder to retrieve and must be one of the values in the enumeration; any other value throws an exception. 如需有關特殊資料夾的詳細資訊，請參閱[CSIDL](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=116664)值主題。For more information about special folders, see the [CSIDL](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=116664) values topic. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用方法，傳回並顯示相關聯的路徑`folder`參數。The following example demonstrates how to use the method to return and display the path associated with the `folder` parameter. summary.span: 取得值，這個值表示正在卸載目前的應用程式定義域，或是正在關閉通用語言執行平台 (CLR)。

span.span: Gets a value that indicates whether the current application domain is being unloaded or the common language runtime (CLR) is shutting down.

value.span: 如果目前的應用程式定義域正在卸載或 CLR 正在關閉;否則， 。

span.span: if the current application domain is being unloaded or the CLR is shutting down; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當 CLR 卸載應用程式定義域時，它會有完成項方法，該應用程式定義域中的所有物件上執行的完成項。When the CLR unloads an application domain, it runs the finalizers on all objects that have a finalizer method in that application domain. 當 CLR 關閉時，它會首先完成項執行緒有完成項方法的所有物件上。When the CLR shuts down, it starts the finalizer thread on all objects that have a finalizer method. 屬性會傳回`true`只啟動完成項執行緒之後。The property returns `true` only after the finalizer thread has been started. 當屬性傳回`true`，您可以決定應用程式定義域正在卸載或 CLR 本身正在關機而關閉藉由呼叫方法。When the property returns `true`, you can determine whether an application domain is being unloaded or the CLR itself is shutting down by calling the method. 這個方法會傳回`true`因為應用程式定義域正在卸載，如果呼叫完成項或`false`如果 CLR 正在關閉。This method returns `true` if finalizers are called because the application domain is unloading or `false` if the CLR is shutting down. 屬性會傳回`false`如果完成項執行緒未啟動。The property returns `false` if the finalizer thread has not been started. 藉由使用這個屬性，您可以判斷是否要存取您的最終處理程式碼中的靜態變數。By using this property, you can determine whether to access static variables in your finalization code. 如果應用程式定義域或 CLR 正在關閉，您無法可靠地存取任何具有最終處理方法，且由靜態欄位所參考的物件。If either an application domain or the CLR is shutting down, you cannot reliably access any object that has a finalization method and that is referenced by a static field. 這是因為這些物件可能已經結束。This is because these objects may have already been finalized.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 呼叫這個方法就相當於呼叫值是多載如`target`引數。Calling this method is equivalent to calling the overload with a value of for the `target` argument. 如果`value`引數不是空白 （請參閱刪除環境變數來定義的值是空的本節稍後的討論） 命名的環境變數和`variable`參數不存在，環境建立並指派的內容變數`value`。If the `value` argument is not empty (see the discussion of deleting an environment variable later in this section for the definition of an empty value) and the environment variable named by the `variable` parameter does not exist, the environment variable is created and assigned the contents of `value`. 如果檔案存在，則會修改它的值。If it does exist, its value is modified. 目前的處理序的環境區塊中定義的環境變數，因為它不會保存之後的處理序已結束。Because the environment variable is defined in the environment block of the current process only, it does not persist after the process has ended. 如果`variable`包含非初始十六進位零字元、 字元 「 零 」 字元會被視為環境變數名稱，並忽略所有後續的字元。If `variable` contains a non-initial hexadecimal zero character, the characters before the zero character are considered the environment variable name and all subsequent characters are ignored. 如果`value`包含非初始十六進位零字元，「 零 」 字元指派給環境變數，並忽略所有後續的字元之前的字元。If `value` contains a non-initial hexadecimal zero character, the characters before the zero character are assigned to the environment variable and all subsequent characters are ignored. 如果`value`是空值和命名的環境變數`variable`存在，會刪除環境變數。If `value` is empty and the environment variable named by `variable` exists, the environment variable is deleted. 如果`variable`不存在，就會發生任何錯誤即使無法執行此作業。If `variable` does not exist, no error occurs even though the operation cannot be performed. `value` 會被視為空任何下列的情況下：`value` is considered empty under any of the following conditions: - 它是`null`。It is `null`. - 它是。It is . - 它包含單一字元，其值是 U + 0000。It consists of a single character whose value is U+0000. ## Examples 下列範例會測試名為環境變數是否`APPDOMAIN`存在於目前的處理序。The following example tests whether an environment variable named `APPDOMAIN` exists in the current process. 如果不存在，它就會加以建立，並將它的值為"True"。If it does not, it creates it and sets its value to "True". 如果值`APPDOMAIN`環境變數為"True"，它會呼叫`Message.Display`新的應用程式定義域中的方法。If the value of the `APPDOMAIN` environment variable is "True", it calls the `Message.Display` method in a new application domain. 否則，它會執行`Message.Display`目前的應用程式定義域中的方法。Otherwise, it executes the `Message.Display` method in the current application domain. [!code-csharp[System.Environment.SetEnvironmentVariable#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.environment.setenvironmentvariable/cs/setenvironmentvariable1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Environment.SetEnvironmentVariable#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.environment.setenvironmentvariable/vb/setenvironmentvariable1.vb#1)] 如果您是第一次執行範例，訊息就會有 「 執行中網域 Domain2"顯示到主控台中。If you run the example for the first time, the message "Executing in domain Domain2" displays to the console. 如果您設定環境變數，您可以從命令列使用命令：If you set the environment variable from the command line by using the command: `Set AppDomain=False` 此範例會顯示訊息 「 在定義域中執行*exeName*.exe"，其中*exeName*是可執行檔的名稱。the example displays the message "Executing in domain *exeName*.exe", where *exeName* is the name of the executable. 下列範例會嘗試擷取名為環境變數的值`Test1`程序的環境區塊中。The following example attempts to retrieve the value of an environment variable named `Test1` from the process environment block. 如果變數不存在，此範例會建立變數，並擷取其值。If the variable doesn't exist, the example creates the variable and retrieves its value. 此範例會顯示變數的值。The example displays the value of the variable. 如果此範例會建立變數，它也會呼叫方法的每個成員列舉型別，以建立可以擷取只會從目前的處理程序的環境區塊的變數。If the example created the variable, it also calls the method with each member of the enumeration to establish that the variable can be retrieved only from the current process environment block. 最後，如果此範例會建立變數，它會刪除它。Finally, if the example created the variable, it deletes it. [!code-csharp[System.Environment.GetEnvironmentVariable#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.environment.getenvironmentvariable/cs/getenvironmentvariableex1.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Environment.GetEnvironmentVariable#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.environment.getenvironmentvariable/vb/getenvironmentvariableex1.vb#2)]

summary.span: 建立、修改或刪除儲存在目前的處理序中，或是儲存在保留給目前使用者或本機電腦的 Windows 作業系統登錄機碼中的環境變數。

span.span: Creates, modifies, or deletes an environment variable stored in the current process or in the Windows operating system registry key reserved for the current user or local machine.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法可讓您定義環境變數提供給目前的處理序 (值)。The method lets you define an environment variable that is available to the current process (the value). 目前的處理程序的環境區塊獨有的環境變數會保存在程序結束時，才。Environment variables that are unique to the current process environment block persist only until the process ends. 此外，Windows 系統上僅方法可讓您定義環境變數所提供的機器上執行的所有處理程序 (值) 和使用者執行的所有處理程序 (值)。In addition, on Windows systems only, the method lets you define an environment variable that is available to all processes that run on a machine (the value) and to all processes run by a user (the value). 每台電腦和每個使用者環境變數會複製到目前的處理序的環境區塊。Per-machine and per-user environment variables are copied into the environment block of the current process. 在 macOS 和 Linux 系統上的.NET Core 上呼叫方法的值或都會被忽略。On .NET Core on macOS and Linux systems, calls to the method with a value of or are ignored. 如果`value`引數不是空白 （請參閱刪除環境變數來定義的值是空的本節稍後的討論） 命名的環境變數和`variable`引數不存在，環境建立並指派的內容變數`value`。If the `value` argument is not empty (see the discussion of deleting an environment variable later in this section for the definition of an empty value) and the environment variable named by the `variable` argument does not exist, the environment variable is created and assigned the contents of `value`. 如果檔案存在，則會修改它的值。If it does exist, its value is modified. 如果`variable`包含非初始十六進位零字元、 字元 「 零 」 字元會被視為環境變數名稱，並忽略所有後續的字元。If `variable` contains a non-initial hexadecimal zero character, the characters before the zero character are considered the environment variable name and all subsequent characters are ignored. 如果`value`包含非初始十六進位零字元，「 零 」 字元指派給環境變數，並忽略所有後續的字元之前的字元。If `value` contains a non-initial hexadecimal zero character, the characters before the zero character are assigned to the environment variable and all subsequent characters are ignored. 如果`value`是空值和命名的環境變數`variable`存在，會刪除環境變數。If `value` is empty and the environment variable named by `variable` exists, the environment variable is deleted. `value` 會被視為空任何下列的情況下：`value` is considered empty under any of the following conditions: - 它是`null`。It is `null`. - 它是。It is . - 它包含單一字元，其值是 U + 0000。It consists of a single character whose value is U+0000. 如果`variable`不存在，就會發生任何錯誤雖然無法執行此作業。If `variable` does not exist, no error occurs although the operation cannot be performed. 時請小心`target`是，因為您可以不小心刪除環境變數會影響整個本機電腦，不只是目前的處理序或使用者。Be careful when `target` is , because you can accidentally delete an environment variable that affects your entire local machine, not just the current process or user. ### EnvironmentVariableTarget.Machine 和 Windows 系統上的 EnvironmentVariableTarget.UserEnvironmentVariableTarget.Machine and EnvironmentVariableTarget.User on Windows systems 如果`target`是，環境變數會儲存在 HKEY_CURRENT_USER\Environment 機碼的本機電腦的登錄。If `target` is , the environment variable is stored in the HKEY_CURRENT_USER\Environment key of the local computer's registry. 它也會複製到檔案總管 的目前的使用者執行的執行個體。It is also copied to instances of File Explorer that are running as the current user. 環境變數接著會由使用者啟動檔案總管 中的任何新處理序繼承。The environment variable is then inherited by any new processes that the user launches from File Explorer. 同樣地，如果`target`是，環境變數會儲存在本機電腦的登錄 HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\SYSTEM\ControlSet001\Control\Session Manager\Environment 索引鍵。Similarly, if `target` is , the environment variable is stored in the HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\SYSTEM\ControlSet001\Control\Session Manager\Environment key of the local computer's registry. 它也會複製到檔案總管 中的所有執行個體。It is also copied to all instances of File Explorer. 從檔案總管 中啟動任何新處理序會再繼承環境變數。The environment variable is then inherited by any new processes that are launched from File Explorer. 如果`target`已或是，其他應用程式都會收到通知，設定作業的 Windows`WM_SETTINGCHANGE`訊息。If `target` is or , other applications are notified of the set operation by a Windows `WM_SETTINGCHANGE` message. 如果`target`已或是，我們建議的長度`value`小於 2048年個字元。If `target` is or , we recommend that the length of `value` be less than 2048 characters. ## Examples 下列範例會建立環境變數， ，和為目標時，會檢查作業系統登錄是否包含使用者和電腦的環境變數，然後刪除環境變數。The following example creates environment variables for the , , and targets, checks whether the operating system registry contains the user and machine environment variables, then deletes the environment variables. [!code-cpp[environment.getsetenvar#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/environment.getsetenvar/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[environment.getsetenvar#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/environment.getsetenvar/CS/gsev.cs#1)] [!code-vb[environment.getsetenvar#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/environment.getsetenvar/VB/gsev.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性清單的相反時間順序的方法呼叫，也就是第一次，所述的最新的方法呼叫和一行的堆疊追蹤資訊會列在堆疊上每個方法呼叫。The property lists method calls in reverse chronological order, that is, the most recent method call is described first, and one line of stack trace information is listed for each method call on the stack. 不過，屬性可能不會報告如預期般運作，因為發生在最佳化期間的程式碼轉換的多個方法呼叫。However, the property might not report as many method calls as expected due to code transformations that occur during optimization. > [!NOTE] > 針對由類別的堆疊追蹤資訊的階層式檢視，使用類別。For a hierarchical view of the stack trace information by class, use the class. 屬性格式化每個方法呼叫的堆疊追蹤資訊，如下所示：The property formats the stack trace information for each method call as follows: 「 在`FullClassName`。`MethodName`(`MethodParams`) 中`FileName`： 列`LineNumber`""at `FullClassName`.`MethodName`(`MethodParams`) in `FileName` :line `LineNumber` " 前面三個空格，加上"at"常值，如果無法使用的偵錯符號，則會忽略整個開頭為"in"的子字串。The literal "at" is preceded by three spaces, and the entire substring starting with "in" is omitted if debug symbols are not available. 預留位置`FullClassName`， `MethodName`， `MethodParams`， `FileName`，和`LineNumber`、 以實際的值，取代及定義，如下所示：The placeholders, `FullClassName`, `MethodName`, `MethodParams`, `FileName`, and `LineNumber`, are replaced by actual values, and are defined as follows: FullClassNameFullClassName 類別，包括命名空間的完整名稱。The full name of the class, including the namespace. `MethodName` 方法的名稱。The name of the method. `MethodParams` 參數類型/名稱組的清單。The list of parameter type/name pairs. 每一組以逗號分隔 （"，"）。Each pair is separated by a comma (","). 如果，則會忽略這項資訊`MethodName`不接受任何參數。This information is omitted if `MethodName` takes no parameters. `FileName` 來源名稱檔`MethodName`方法宣告。The name of the source file where the `MethodName` method is declared. 如果無法使用的偵錯符號，則會忽略這項資訊。This information is omitted if debug symbols are not available. `LineNumber` 在 行號`FileName`包含從原始程式碼`MethodName`呼叫堆疊上的指示。The number of the line in `FileName` that contains the source code from `MethodName` for the instruction that is on the call stack. 如果無法使用的偵錯符號，則會忽略這項資訊。This information is omitted if debug symbols are not available. 字串結束的堆疊追蹤的每一行。The string terminates each line of the stack trace. ## Examples 下列範例示範屬性。The following example demonstrates the property. summary.span: 取得系統啟動後經過的毫秒數。

span.span: Gets the number of milliseconds elapsed since the system started.

value.span: 32 位元帶正負號的整數，包含自上一次電腦啟動後所經過的毫秒時間量。

span.span: A 32-bit signed integer containing the amount of time in milliseconds that has passed since the last time the computer was started.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性的值衍生自系統計時器，並會儲存為 32 位元帶正負號的整數。The value of this property is derived from the system timer and is stored as a 32-bit signed integer. 請注意，因為它衍生自系統計時器解析度屬性僅限於系統計時器，通常是在 10 到 16 毫秒的範圍內的解析。Note that, because it is derived from the system timer, the resolution of the property is limited to the resolution of the system timer, which is typically in the range of 10 to 16 milliseconds. > [!IMPORTANT] > 因為值屬性值是 32 位元帶正負號的整數，系統會連續執行，會從零到遞增大約 24.9 天，然後跳至，這是負數，然後遞增回下一個 24.9 指定天數內的零。Because the value of the property value is a 32-bit signed integer, if the system runs continuously, will increment from zero to for approximately 24.9 days, then jump to , which is a negative number, then increment back to zero during the next 24.9 days. 您可以暫時解決此問題，藉由呼叫 Windows [GetTickCount](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/desktop/ms724408.aspx)函式，這樣會重設為在大約 49.7 天的資料，或藉由呼叫零[GetTickCount64](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/desktop/ms724411.aspx)函式。You can work around this issue by calling the Windows [GetTickCount](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/desktop/ms724408.aspx) function, which resets to zero after approximately 49.7 days, or by calling the [GetTickCount64](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/desktop/ms724411.aspx) function. 不同於屬性，也就是 1/1/0001，12:00 am 起已經過 100 奈秒間隔數。 is different from the property, which is the number of 100-nanosecond intervals that have elapsed since 1/1/0001, 12:00am. 使用屬性，以取得目前本機日期和時間，在此電腦上的。Use the property to obtain the current local date and time on this computer. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何擷取傳回值的正數範圍屬性。The following example demonstrates how to retrieve the positive range of values returned by the property. 屬性之間的循環，這是負數，和每 49.8 天。The property cycles between , which is a negative number, and once every 49.8 days. 此程式碼範例會移除產生零之間循環的非負值數字的正負號位元和每 24.9 天。This code sample removes the sign bit to yield a nonnegative number that cycles between zero and once every 24.9 days. [!code-cpp[environment.tickcount#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Environment.TickCount/CPP/tickcount.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[environment.tickcount#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Environment.TickCount/CS/tickcount.cs#1)] [!code-vb[environment.tickcount#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/Environment.TickCount/VB/tickcount.vb#1)]

summary.span: 取得與目前使用者相關聯的網路網域名稱。

span.span: Gets the network domain name associated with the current user.

value.span: 與目前使用者相關聯的網路網域名稱。

span.span: The network domain name associated with the current user.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用者的網域帳戶認證會格式化為使用者的網域名稱，'\\' 字元，以及使用者名稱。The domain account credentials for a user are formatted as the user's domain name, the '\\' character, and user name. 使用屬性，以取得使用者的網域名稱，而不需要使用者名稱，而屬性，以取得不含網域名稱的使用者名稱。Use the property to obtain the user's domain name without the user name, and the property to obtain the user name without the domain name. 例如，如果使用者的網域名稱和使用者名稱 CORPORATENETWORK\john，屬性會傳回"CORPORATENETWORK 」。For example, if a user's domain name and user name are CORPORATENETWORK\john, the property returns "CORPORATENETWORK". 屬性第一次嘗試取得目前使用者的 Windows 帳戶名稱的網域名稱元件。The property first attempts to get the domain name component of the Windows account name for the current user. 如果該嘗試失敗時，這個屬性會嘗試取得所提供的使用者名稱相關聯的網域名稱屬性。If that attempt fails, this property attempts to get the domain name associated with the user name provided by the property. 如果該嘗試失敗，因為主機電腦未加入網域，則會傳回主機電腦的名稱。If that attempt fails because the host computer is not joined to a domain, then the host computer name is returned.

exception.span: 作業系統不支援擷取網路網域名稱。

span.span: The operating system does not support retrieving the network domain name.

exception.span: 無法擷取網路網域名稱。

span.span: The network domain name cannot be retrieved.

span.span: if the current process is running in user interactive mode; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性報告`false`Windows 處理程序或執行不含使用者介面的 IIS 之類的服務。The property reports `false` for a Windows process or a service like IIS that runs without a user interface. 如果此屬性為`false`，不會顯示強制回應對話方塊或訊息方塊，因為沒有使用者互動的圖形化使用者介面。If this property is `false`, do not display modal dialogs or message boxes because there is no graphical user interface for the user to interact with. ## Examples 下列範例會顯示目前的處理序是執行於使用者互動模式。The following example displays whether the current process is running in user interactive mode. summary.span: 取得目前登入作業系統之人員的使用者名稱。

span.span: Gets the user name of the person who is currently logged on to the operating system.

value.span: 登入作業系統之人員的使用者名稱。

span.span: The user name of the person who is logged on to the operating system.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用屬性來識別目前的執行緒，基於安全性或存取的應用程式與系統上的使用者。You can use the property to identify the user on the current thread, to the system and application for security or access purposes. 也可用以自訂每位使用者的特定應用程式。It can also be used to customize a particular application for each user. 在 Windows 上屬性會包裝 Windows 呼叫[GetUserName](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/desktop/ms724432.aspx)函式。On Windows the property wraps a call to the Windows [GetUserName](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/desktop/ms724432.aspx) function. 使用者的網域帳戶認證會格式化為使用者的網域名稱，'\\' 字元，以及使用者名稱。The domain account credentials for a user are formatted as the user's domain name, the '\\' character, and user name. 使用屬性，以取得使用者的網域名稱和屬性，以取得使用者名稱。Use the property to obtain the user's domain name and the property to obtain the user name. 在 Unix 平台上屬性會包裝對`getpwuid_r`函式。On Unix platforms the property wraps a call to the `getpwuid_r` function. 如果 ASP.NET 應用程式是在開發環境中，執行屬性會傳回目前使用者的名稱。If an ASP.NET application runs in a development environment, the property returns the name of the current user. 已發行的 ASP.NET 應用程式中，這個屬性會傳回 （例如預設應用程式集區） 的應用程式集區帳戶的名稱。In a published ASP.NET application, this property returns the name of the application pool account (such as Default AppPool). ## Examples 下列範例會顯示啟動目前的執行緒之人員的使用者名稱。The following example displays the user name of the person who started the current thread. [!code-cpp[Environment.UserName#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Environment.UserName/CPP/username.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Environment.UserName#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Environment.UserName/CS/username.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Environment.UserName#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/Environment.UserName/VB/username.vb#1)]

summary.span: 取得描述通用語言執行平台的主要、次要、組建 (Build) 和修訂編號的 物件。

span.span: Gets a object that describes the major, minor, build, and revision numbers of the common language runtime.

value.span: 顯示 Common Language Runtime 版本的物件。

span.span: An object that displays the version of the common language runtime.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 針對 .NET Framework 4、4.5、4.5.1 和 4.5.2 版， 屬性會傳回 物件，其字串表示的格式為 `4.0.30319.xxxxx`。For the .NET Framework Versions 4, 4.5, 4.5.1, and 4.5.2, the property returns a object whose string representation has the form `4.0.30319.xxxxx`. .NET Framework 4.6 和更新版本，其形式`4.0.30319.42000`。For the .NET Framework 4.6 and later versions, it has the form `4.0.30319.42000`. > [!WARNING] > 針對[!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)]和更新版本中，我們不建議使用屬性來偵測新版執行階段; 相反地，您可以透過查詢登錄判斷 common language runtime 的版本。For the [!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)] and later, we do not recommend using the property to detect the version of the runtime; instead, you can determine the version of the common language runtime by querying the registry. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[如何：判斷安裝的 .NET Framework 版本](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/how-to-determine-which-versions-are-installed.md)。For more information, see [How to: Determine Which .NET Framework Versions Are Installed](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/how-to-determine-which-versions-are-installed.md). 如需安裝每個版本的.NET framework common language runtime 版本的詳細資訊，請參閱[版本和相依性](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md)。For more information about the version of the common language runtime that is installed with each version of the .NET Framework, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md). ## Examples 下列範例會顯示 common language runtime 的版本。The following example displays the version of the common language runtime. （基於安全性理由，範例輸出中會省略版本）。(The version is omitted from the example output for security reasons.) [!code-cpp[Environment.Version#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Environment.Version/CPP/version.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Environment.Version#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Environment.Version/CS/version.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Environment.Version#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/Environment.Version/VB/version.vb#1)]
